item.title: [AFRICA/DE/CZ/LTE/PL/NL/FI/GB/IE/ES/IT/PT][Support] - Support unreachable by phone

Nov 28, 13:40 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/11/2023 09:30 UTC
End time : 28/11/2023 10:20 UTC
Service impact : Support was temporarily unreachable by phone
Root cause : An incident on our providerâ€™s side caused the issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 28, 10:45 UTC

Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Nov 28, 10:10 UTC
Update - Our teams are currently working with our provider to solve the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Nov 28, 09:56 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/11/2023 09:30 UTC
Service impact : Support is temporarily unreachable by phone
Workaround : The Help Centre: https://help.ovhcloud.com remain accessible, you can create your tickets from there.
Also, you can use our Live chat to reach us.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - api.ovh.com EoL Deprecated Routes
item.description:
Nov 13, 10:27 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 13, 09:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 30, 10:22 UTC
Scheduled - Time : 13/11/2023 09:30 UTC
Maintenance : Deletion of deprecated API routes
Impacted routes: 

GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo
GET /domain/{serviceName}/owo/{field}

Notes : API routes are deprecated since several months, and are not returning any features that a customer could use, OVHcloud is now deleting those endpoints.
Customers that currently relies on the deprecated functions must stop their usage, otherwise, they will receive HTTP response with status code 404 Not Found after the deletion maintenance.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - Calling support is not working
item.description:

End Time : 31/10/2023 17:50 UTC

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 31, 17:50 UTC

Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Chat aren't fully stable.
Workaround : The Help Centre: https://help.ovhcloud.com remain accessible, you can create your tickets from there
Ongoing actions : Our team is currently working to fully restore the service.
We apologize for any inconveniences.

We apologize for any inconveniences.

Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - ServiceNow OneGate (Production)/ Help Centre portal maintenance
item.description:
Oct 11, 20:57 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 11, 19:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 10, 15:17 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/10/2023 19:00 UTC
End time : 11/10/2023 21:30 UTC
Service impact : Punctual slowness or logoff of the application might be observed during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update the application to improve security and stability.
Workaround : Help Center will remain accessible https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager. If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency. You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md

Monitoring - Start time : 01/10/2023 00:00 UTC
